text: int main ( ) { int i , j , k , m , n , t ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( m = 0 ; m < n ; m ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; int a [ t ] [ t ] ; for ( k = 0 ; k < t ; k ++ ) { for ( i = 0 ; i <= k ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ k ] [ i ] ) ; } for ( j = t - 1 ; j > 0 ; j -- ) { for ( k = 0 ; k < j ; k ++ ) { if ( a [ j ] [ k ] > a [ j ] [ k + 1 ] ) a [ j - 1 ] [ k ] = a [ j - 1 ] [ k ] + a [ j ] [ k ] ; else a [ j - 1 ] [ k ] = a [ j - 1 ] [ k ] + a [ j ] [ k + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
